question: When you picture your ideal day, which feels most aligned?

options.Explorer: Waking up somewhere new, planning a spontaneous adventure.
options.Nurturer: Spending time with loved ones or helping someone in need.
options.Creator: Working on a passion project or creative outlet.
options.Seeker: Reflecting with a journal or reading something that expands my mind.
options.Builder: Tackling a DIY task or organizing something useful.
options.Connector: Meeting up with friends or starting a conversation with someone new.

question: Which compliment would mean the most to you?

options.Nurturer: You make people feel truly cared for.
options.Creator: You're so imaginative and inspiring.
options.Seeker: You really make me think deeper.
options.Builder: You get things done like no one else.

question: You just got a free day to do anything — what’s your first instinct?

options.Explorer: Try something I’ve never done before.
options.Nurturer: Call someone I love and check in.
options.Creator: Dive into a hobby or new project.
options.Seeker: Spend quiet time reflecting or exploring my thoughts.
options.Builder: Fix, sort, or plan something I’ve been meaning to get to.
options.Connector: Invite someone to hang out or plan a gathering.
